component.name: tidal-hifi
component.summary: The web version of listen.tidal.com with hifi support

description.p: Listen to over 80 million songs in HiFi quality and access 350K+ music videos through TIDAL with tidal-hifi
Added settings to customize the Discord rich presence information
Restyled settings menu to include version number and useful links on the about page
The ListenBrainz integration has been extended with a configurable (5 seconds by default) delay in song reporting so that it doesn't spam the API when you are cycling through songs.
Added support for Wayland
Added app suspension inhibitors when music is playing
Added ListenBrainz integration
Added Songwhip integration
Fixed bug with several hotkeys not working
Updated Tokyo Night theme
Full blown theming and album art fix
New features
- In the settings window you'll now find a "theming" tab where you can select a theme - You can upload custom theme files there too - Custom CSS overrides any settings in theme files ()
Bugfixes
- Album art now shows on album and playlist plays
Custom CSS, mediaSession API, bugfixes...
New features
Added proper updates through the MediaSession API You can now add custom CSS in the "advanced" settings tab You can now configure the updateFrequency in the settings window (default = 500)
Bugfixes
Any songs including an artist listed in the skipped artists setting will now be skipped even if the song is a collaboration. Linux desktop icons have been fixed. See #222 for details.
Adblocking support thanks to @thanasistrisp.

Replaced "muting artists" with a full implementation of an Adblock mechanism
> Disabled audio & visual ads, unlocked lyrics, suggested track, track info, unlimited skips thanks to uBlockOrigin custom filters (source)
Updated to Electron 24.1.2
Updated shortcut hint on the menubar to reflect the new ctrl+= shortcut.
Add support to autoHide the menubar and showing it with the alt key.
Move the quit command from the system sub-menu to the main menu.
Added single click focus/show on the tray icon.
Added a list of artists to automatically skip.
Fix app always requesting to be set as default app handler on start.
Added a setting to disable background throttling
New settings window
Fix inconsistent auto-muting
Added tidal:// protocol support
Switched icon strategies to fix bugs with icons
Fixed tray icon bugs (Menu now shows in KDE as well, Toggle window is supported from tray icon)
Fixed about tab not showing
Fixed playback, mpris and API issues
Electron update to 19.0.5
Media update timeout set to 500 instead of 200
Updated property name for duration because of a tidal update
flag for "disable hardware media keys" now working again
Added a separate advanced options settings panel with flags
Added gpu-rasterization flag
config setting disableHardwareMediaKeys moved to flags.disableHardwareMediaKeys, it will be migrated automatically
Updated to Electron 15 Added setting to disable multiple tidal-hifi windows (defaults to true) Added setting to disable HardwareMediaKeyHandling (defaults to false)
Hotfix -> no more audio playback
Build bugfix and close button bugfix
Added artist muting
